title: SCP-055

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Hide any mod messages your target might recive, aside from death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Any and all investigative abilities on you will fail.
**Degrading Defense:**Every time your defense successfully blocks an attack, it drops by one level.

desc:
Post 4320
*SCP-055 is a "self-keeping secret" or "anti-meme". Information about SCP-055's physical appearance as well as its nature, behavior, and origins is self-classifying. *
